昒字的基本解释

昒
hū
黎明。

昒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hū］
［《廣韻》呼骨切，入没，曉。］
［《廣韻》文弗切，入物，微。］
亦作“曶1”。
(1)天将明而未明之时；清晨。参见“昒爽”、“昒昕”。
(2)昏暗。参见“昒黑”、“昒漠”。
(3)昏昧，不明白。

昒字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　昒； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页492第01
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?呼骨切，音忽。【說文】尚冥也。【玉篇】旦明也。【前漢·郊祀志】昒?。【註】師古曰：謂日尚冥，蓋未明之時也。【班固·幽通賦】昒昕寤而仰思兮。【註】昒昕，晨旦明也。　又【廣韻】文弗切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】文拂切，?音勿。義同。

昒字的源字形

字源演变：

字形对比：

昒字的起名意思

清晨；黎明，即天将明而未明之时，如昒爽。

Zhu
Basic explanation of words
Zhu
hū
dawn.
Zhu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hū］
["Guangyun" cuts through the bones, enters the end, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" Wen Fuqi, into the matter, micro. ]
Also known as "曶1".
(1) When the sky will be bright but not clear; early in the morning. See "Zun Shuang", "Zun Xin".
(2) Dim. See "Yanhei", "Yanmo".
(3) I am ignorant and do not understand.
Zhu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Department] 　昒; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 492 01
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Call bone cut, sound suddenly. [Said Wen] Shang Ming also. [Jade articles] Dan Ming also. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Zhi] 昒?. [Note] Shigu said: It is said that the sun is still in the dark, and it is also when it is not clear. 【Ban Gu·You Tong Fu】Yun Xin lied and thought about it. [Note] Yun Xin, Chen Dan Ming Ye.　[Guangyun] Wenfuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Wenfuqie, do not sound. The same meaning.

Name meaning
Early morning; dawn, that is, when the sky is about to be bright but not yet clear, it is like a happy day.
hū
гл.
1) внезапно (быстро, вдруг) появляться
蠁(响)昒如神 и вдруг раздаётся звук, как божественное чудо
2) вм. 忽 (пренебрегать)
